original_text:
If I summoned him and he answered me,
    I would not believe that he was listening to my voice.
korean_text: 가령 내가 그를 부르므로 그가 내게 대답하셨을지라도 내 음성을 들으셨다고는 내가 믿지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: If I summoned him and he answered me,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그를 부르고 그가 내게 대답한다면,

sentences.original_text: that he was listening to my voice.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 내 목소리를 듣고 있다는 것
